metatags.og:title: IRS Adrian Project Gives Ramapo Students a Look at Criminal Investigation
metatags.og:description: MAHWAH, N.J. — Forget the pocket protectors and calculators. Twenty-two Ramapo College students – accounting, finance and law and society majors – used different tools to uncover a money laundering operation for terrorists: surveillance equipment, bright red or blue “handguns,” handcuffs and protective vests. Certainly not a typical day of crunching numbers. These students were […]
